tool_description: Creates optimized layout structure for resume content based on selected template and content sections, defining placement and sizing of elements.

template_name.description: Selected template name for layout basis

content_sections.description: List of content sections to be arranged

page_format.description: Page format: A4, US-Letter, or custom

column_preference.description: Layout preference: single-column, two-column, or adaptive

header_style.description: Header layout style: centered, left-aligned, or right-aligned

error_messages: Invalid template name: Provide a valid template name from template recommendations.
Insufficient content sections: Provide at least 2 content sections for layout.
Invalid page format: Use one of [A4, US-Letter, custom].
Invalid column preference: Use one of [single-column, two-column, adaptive].
Invalid header style: Use one of [centered, left-aligned, right-aligned].
usage: Provide template name and content sections, optionally specify page format, column preference, and header style. The tool generates layout specifications with element positioning.
